sorcer.core.context

Class ContextUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.core.context.ContextUtil

  • public class ContextUtil
extends Object
    Static fields and methods copied from Contexts. Not moved so original Contexts class is not changed. Migrate after sorcer codebases are merged.
    Author:
    Rafał Krupiński
